Remove any excess with the Cake Lace spreading knife. 4. Place into your pre-heated oven for 8-10 minutes to dry your Cake Lace. 5. Remove from the oven and set aside for 5 minutes for the Cake Lace to cool. 6. Check that the Cake Lace is ready by peeling the edge of the Cake Lace from the mat. It should release easily.
